CustomField.description: When checked, will cause a Contact and an Account to be created when a user submits a question. (If email address is found on another Contact, it will use that Contact and account.) Unchecking this box will put all of the submitted data into the Case.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked, will cause a Contact and an Account to be created when a user submits a question. (If email address is found on another Contact, it will use that Contact and account.) Unchecking this box will put all of the submitted data into the Case.
CustomField.label: Create Contact and Account
